features: PROTECT & STRENGTHEN YOUR HAIR- It features a unique blend of camellia oils and natural extracts that seal up split ends and prevent hair breakage. It is an excellent emollient to keep your hair hydrated and supple
IMPROVING BLOOD FLOW TO THE SCALP – The pomegranate has been found to strengthen hair follicles by stimulating circulation and improving blood flow to the scalp.
EFFECT OF PROMOTING HAIR GROWTH – The schisandra is a plant that works as an “adaptogen” and has been used as a medicine. It is known for its effect of promoting hair growth for men and women

NOURISHES EXTREMELY DAMAGED HAIR AND HAIR ROOTS– Have you experienced your hair to be cut and break while brushing? Then, this product may be the answer. It is specially made for severely damaged hair and to deeply condition it. It helps to turn coarse, frizzy, dry hair to manageable and silky hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I always use this conditioner, I normally buy it in person. But I could not find it since I am not home, so I had to order. Pretty sad it was marked up by $4 compared to in person, but it is still the same conditioner, same bottle and packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the product, it smells good. Hopefully it would help with my hair fall problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Repairs my damaged hair!
reviews.reviewText: Love using this product! After a few uses, I could tell my hair felt softer and less frizzy! A little goes a long way (I usually will use 2 pumps vs 3-5 pumps of other conditioners I've used) so I know it will last me awhile.Has a oriental medicine-like smell but I don't mind it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan of the new formula!
reviews.reviewText: Ryo seems to have changed the formula for this conditioner in addition to the bottle design. I have been using this line of Ryo since the early days of the pandemic, when my American style shampoo started drying out my scalp. I have been a big fan ever since - the quality was great, did not dry out my scalp, and did not irritate my skin overall (I have eczema and some products are irritating). This new formula is very different from the old conditioner; its thick and gloopy like cheap drugstore shampoo and does not smell like ginseng. While wet, my hair did not feel smooth at all, it felt tangled as if I had not even used conditioner. After blowdrying, my hair did become softer but my scalp felt tight and itchy. I have never had that kind of response to Ryo before. Please bring back the old formula!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a floral. I love floral scents. When it comes out of the bottle whooo. It takes over the air.Way too strong for me. My hair looked a mess.No thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
